1113.content:
It was several hours past dusk, and evreything was quiet in the Son house Goku was snoring loadly next to his wife, who had long since learned to deal with it thanks to some high end ear plugs from capsle corp. It had been sevreal weeks since the end of the Tournament of Power, Goku finaly haveing been forgiven by ChiChi was enjoying a nice rest after another day of working at his current job. It wasn't bad working at the fields, he was allowed to use his stength to remove any stumps or rocks that where in the field, and to his wife's joy, goku was even given a promotion to help manage more of the fields.
It was not that however that mattered. In the forest that Suronded the son home a figer creeped. Emerging frm the line of trees, a silent shadow gracfuly mad its way closer to the small house, not singgle step making any sound. The figuer quickly approched the door walking through it as if it was not there, before it began making its way to the back of the house. The first door to Goten room was ignoored in favor to the one after, the master bed room.
Slowly to not awaken the couple within the figuer creeped twoards the bed. Goku stirred slightly, causing the figer to stop for a moment before it continued its approch Leaning closer to goku the figuer mummbled into the sayins ear, before planting a quick kiss to his cheek. Unseen to anyone the figuer smiled before dissappering into the darkness, knowing that eventually Goku would come to them. Unbeknownst to anyone the figuer had been drawn to goku for is power as a Sayin god, and had left with him a gift to further his strenght in time, now it was mearly a matter of waiting to see what happned.

1312322.content:
"I wish that I was not only a hundred times stronger than I am now but that I was also a billion times sexier than the sexiest thing in existence as well as aquire god Ki!" Chi-chi shouted out this final wish.

" Your wish has been granted." Roared the mighty dragon.
Chi-chi felt it all at once. It was as though every individual cell in her body was suffused with the energy of countless galaxies! Her muscles body swelled in size until she was a Hundred times bigger as was described in her wish but not only that every fiber of her being was twisted and reshaped to make more and more beautiful and alluring with each passing second. When her transformation was finally done she was almost unrecognizable. She stood a towering obelisk of power and feminine beauty that demanded that all be in awe and worship of it. Reality bent and twisted before her very presence , causing space and time to ripple and distort in bizarre and unnatural ways. Lastly her beauty. It could not be described in mere words, it could not be contained within the language and dimensions of little grey cells. To even attempt such a thing would drive lesser beings to complete madness. Yes, she had ascended, truly, to not simply godhood but Godhead! The dragon, finished with its work, Bellowed a deafening "farewell" before shining with brilliant light and scattering into seven distinct pieces and rocketing across the sky in opposite directions to parts unknown. When the sky returned to normal Chi-chi down upon herself in satisfaction.
She finally had the power to defend herself and her family from any conceivable threat and became the hottest woman ever. She looked toward the ground, the sudden shift in weight causing a minor earthquake as she did, and began to enact her next course of action.
1312322.title: Goddess of power and sex

13123222.content:
Chichi was filled with excitement and anticipation as she activated to power of the Namekian dragon balls , courtesy of Dende, and summoning the mighty Porunga! Once more the skies darkened and from a bolt of lightning the great dragon spirit appeared. To anyone else the being in question would be an incredibly Imposing and intimidating thing to be in the presence of but before what Chichi has become he was barely an insect, This was completely inconsequential to the monumental woman though. “ Speak thy wish and it shall be granted!” The sacred beast roared. Chichi, having already decided on what her wishes would be, wasted no time making her commands. “ For my first two wishes. I wish that I had magical powers and intelligence comparable to my strength and beauty!” The titanic former princess declared in a booming voice that literally shook the earth and Heavens to their cores.
“ Very well. You wish has been granted!” the dragon god boomed, its eyes glowing a bright gold as it did.
Chichi was suddenly overcome with different yet equally euphoric and powerful sensations from her last transformation as the dragon’s power did its work. Her body filled with an energy that was alien to her. Unlike Ki , which felt akin to a blazing fire within her, this power felt akin to an immense cloud or bubble
That made everything it touches feel less “real”, as though the world was a mere product of her imagination.
Meanwhile the aspiring goddess could feel her mind expanding to levels that were completely unfathomable to mortal beings as well as most gods for that matter. So great was her cognitive ability that she could encapsulate the totality of the entire multiverse and beyond with less than an after thought
Chichi was nearly overwhelmed by the sheer influx of information she just experienced but was able to keep enough of her wits for one final wish.
“ For my last wish, I want the ability to raise my abilities and any aspect of my being at will as well as the ability to wield hakai!” Roared the heavenly Titaness, who sent after shocks which reverberated throughout the universe as she did.
Porunga with one final growl and a wave of its hand made the giantess’s wish a reality.
Chichi threw head back and screamed as seemingly endless pleasure suffused her entire being down to her very muons. At the Same time her body was engulfed in a blinding white light of such intensity it could be seen throughout the galaxy!
Five whole minutes passed until the light finally died down and Chichi could be found panting and breathless from the experience.
The dragon began to rise higher toward the sky. “ All wishes have been granted,. Farewell!” with that his body became a bright light before transforming into seven distinct spheres which jettisoned away from each other at great speeds with the sky clearing shortly after. Once Chichi regained her composure she stared in awe at herself. Standing at 120.5 kilometers tall ( 395,276 feet) She was a truly monolithic existence. She experimentally flexed her right arm ever so slightly. The bicep bulged for only the briefest of moments be it was enough to generate a shock wave powerful enough to shear clean entire mountain ranges and blast away the surrounding forests and valleys of all flora and sediment and even water until there was nothing left except bare bedrock as far as the eye could see.
Chichi could only stare in stunned silence at the damage she caused by barely even twitching her arm while still holding back immeasurably! This continued for an uncomfortably long time until the Titaness burst out laughing. She laughed an earth shaking laugh that caused magnitude seven to eight earthquakes and tsunamis to erupt all over the planet. “This is perfect!” the godlike woman said to herself. “ I'm so strong now I believe I can do anything !”
She was truly supreme now, containing infinitely more power in a single one of her atoms than every other being in the known multiverse combined! Now that she is strongest there is, she would never have to fear anything threatening her and her loved ones ever again. The Son family Matriarch noticed that her literal mountainous valley of cleavage, held aloft by her infinitely powerful pectorals, actively obstructed her vision to the point where she would normally have to completely bend over in order to see past them but this was of no concern, with her new powers she no longer needed her eyes to see.
Chichi looked behind herself to see she now possessed an equally profound and perfectly formed derriere framed by an also equally profound set of hips. She gave it a little shake, which produced gale force winds and the formation of EF5 tornadoes as a result, and giggled to herself. With all this power nothing was out of reach! However she was at a loss for what to do first.

1331311211.title: Bulma wants more power

13313112112.content:
As Bulma arrived at Chi-Chi's house, she hard a shattering noise from inside. She changed to normal form and walked in to find Chi-Chi having a hard time controlling her new strength while washing the dishes.
C: "Great... first I get this weird tail and now I can't even control myself. What's wrong with me..."
B: "I think I can explain that."
C: "Oh! Hey Bulma, what brings you out here?"
B: "I stopped by to see if my wish on the dragonballs worked as planned, and I see that it did. You are a saiyan now."
C: "I'm a saiyan now!? No no no! Why!?"
B: "I wished that on you so that you have nearly infinite power and stamina. Let me show you what I mean."
The two of them went outside and Bulma grew to legendary super saiyan form.
C: "Bulma!? How did you do that!?"
B: "Part of my wish, and you can do it too."
C: "How do I do that?"
B: "Just focus your energy on what form you want to become. Since your a saiyan now, ki control is second nature to you."
C: "... Ok, fine. I'll give it a go."
Chi-Chi concentrated on what Bulma looked like and ended up growing and growing to the point where she was in legendary form. She was in awe and in chock atthe same time.
C: "How did... Am I..."
B: "Yes, you got it down. Now you have the ability to keep up with Goku and Gohan when they run off."
C: "Really? That's great and all, but is this the only form I can access?"
B: "Nope. Any sort of super saiyan form that any saiyan has ever transformed into before is now at your fingertips. Just focus on it and you'll change into it easily."
C: "No way. That's awesome Bulma! Thank you. Well, I'm off to test my powers now. Bye now."
She changed back to regular form and flew off to a nearby mountain range.

The entire sight was an incredibly erotic display.

With her new strength and power, Bulma instantly blasted into the air and flew back to Kami’s Lookout in record time. She slowly walked towards the chamber and opened the door to find…
133131121121.title: Follow Bulma

1331311211212.content:
As Bulma stepped back into the Time Chamber, she was expecting to see Trunks and Vegeta training as they normally do. But it turns out she was wrong, almost. She saw Trunks passed out in bed while Vegeta was sitting at the stairs leading into the void of the chamber. What was even stranger is that Bulla was actually training in the void in what looked now like SSG mixed with SS3. Apparently she became aware of Bulma's wish after she made it, and decided to practice it.

B: Well hey Vegeta, I'm back from my errand.
V: Hello Bulma, nice of you to return. Judging by the looks of you, I think I understand why Bulla can do what she just did a few minutes ago.
B: What would that be?
V: Look at her. She's somehow found a way to fuse transformations. Her hair is long like a Super Sayian 3, but it's red just like a Super Sayian God. Her frame and muscle tone is also like that of a Super Saiyan God as well. Did you make another wish with the Dragonballs?
B: Guilty is charged, and I'm loving every second of it. What's with Trunks over there?
V: Before you came back, something came over Bulla and asked me to teach her how to fight. So I did, and she picked up everything I taught her perfectly as though she was a very seasoned warrior. After a while, she knew almost every technique I can teach her and she wanted to test her skills out on someone. Trunks decided to fight her using Super Saiyan Blue on her, but then she turned into what she is now and knocked him out in a few blows. Then she faught me and I barely beat her. What you're seeing right now is her acting out of frustration. I guess you could say your wish gave her a sense of pride that she never had before. She's obviously one of a kind aside from yourself and whoever else your second wishes affected, which makes her special since her power is unreal.
B: Wow, I didn't think that we would end up that strong. She's already able to beat Trunks and give you a run for you money. I'm really impressed, and kinda surprised with how well you're taking it.
V: Believe me, I'm not happy with nearly losing to someone who just started fighting a day ago, but I she's also my daughter so I'm glad that if anyone can beat me in battle, it's my own flesh and blood.
B: Speaking of fighting, would you like to teach me how to fight? I've already mastered all the transformations as you can tell *she says as she flips her long blue hair back*, but I want to learn and help if just you and Goku aren't enough.

Vegeta turns his eyes to meet hers and thinks about it for a moment.
V: Ok fine. I'll teach you. I'm curious to see if you're able to learn at the same pace as her.

After a few hours of training, Bulma managed to learn pretty much as much as Bulla did since both of them have infinite stamina. She also tried what she learned using various different combinations of forms. She eventually decided her combo would be SSB with Legendary form.

Where do they go from here?

Good thing I have a lot more DNA than this."

She took a shower and as she was in there, she noticed her muscles were significantly bigger than before. She was roughly the size of a female body builder at this point. She decided to monitor the DNA changed for the next few days to see what else changes.

1332222.content: It's been a week since Bulma injected herself, and she has loved every second of it. Every single day she wakes up larger in every way physically. Every day she would compare DNA from a day prior to current day and she noticed that the saiyan DNA was slowly changing hers to the point where now she is basically a full saiyan complete with a tail. She was the size of a male bodybuilder and could manage to walk around in 500x normal gravity with little to no difficulty. She couldn't wait to show it to Vegeta when he comes home from training with Goku and Whis. She realized after a while that her saiyan DNA was possibly made her more powerful than the other saiyans considering how much stronger she was after every time she would push herself to the limit. Last night, she had a dream that she was in a form similar to the legendary super saiyan form and put some thought into it, "Maybe I am able to achieve that form since I have some of Broly's DNA in me. Seems like a long shot, but maybe if I can focus on releasing that ki I might just make it happen." She stepped outside and began to focus for a while, and then began to transform. Growing larger and larger, she successfully changed into legendary form. She flew into the gravity chamber to test out her new power, and managed to reach 1500x normal gravity. She was still pretty much unaffected, but she wanted it to still be intact for Vegeta when he returns sooner or later. For now, she loved her new powers.

choices: Saiyan blood takes over and she attacks the planet
13322222.content: A few days after her transformation, Vegeta returned home to find Bulma. Her powers began to rise exponentially and she was a full saiyan, complete with a tail, which she cut off. Vegeta was surprised to find his wife twice the size of himself and with tremendous power in what he knew as her base form, still unaware of her newly found saiyan heritage. Bulma challenged Vegeta to a fight and, being the saiyan he is, accepted thinking he would defeat her easily. Bulma started out in her base form and began to beat on Vegeta. After a few hits from Bulma, Vegeta went super saiyan, but Bulma was able to grab him and force him into the ground. He switch to super saiyan blue and the fight continued. Bulma grabbed Vegeta by the arm and threw him into space. She then launched ki blasts at him, forcing him to collide with the moon, and then she transformed, to Vegeta's shock and she threw him as hard as possible without destroying the planet back at Earth. This forced Vegeta out of blue and Bulma went back to her base form as well. Vegeta was terrified at what had happened. He wasn't able to land a hit, but she defeated him effortlessly. What was Bulma to do next?
13322222.title: Vegeta is back

choices: He doesn't teach it to her, but she figures it out anyways.
1333.content: Does she learn the Max Power technique from Roshi?
1333.title: Max Power Bulma?

choices: Bulma decided to have fun with Vegeta in bed at max power that night
13331.content:
Bulma was always busy inventing new items for Capsule Corp. But in her spare time every night that she could, she decided to train with Roshi. Under certain, typical Roshi conditions that she decided to accept because of the reward, she trained to control her ki for a few weeks. She charged a ball of ki and launched it out into the ocean. Roshi was surprised,
R: "Bulma, that was perfect. You learned to control your ki. Now it's time for you to learn to power up."
B: "Awesome! I can't wait to show it off when I figure it out!"
R: "Well, you'll have to wait for a while. I took me a long time before I could figure out how to use the technique myself. I know how to teach it, but it requires a lot of control."
B: "We'll see about that. I'll come back tomorrow and figure this out."
She got into her aircraft and flew home. The next day, she came back to Roshi's island earlier than usual out of anticipation to learn how to grow.
B: "Alright! I wanna learn how to grow, and I need to learn now!"
R: "Ok Ok I get the message. Now, this will require a ton of ki and body control."
He then explained the process of the technique. Bulma began to practice for hours. After working on this for a few days, she began to get the hang of it. At first, she grew to the size of an amateur female body builder, but she grew by leaps and bounds from there on. After a week, she was able to match Roshi's size and strength. Roshi was speechless.
R: "Bulma... You just mastered a technique that took me months to master in the span of a week. You must have something special considering someone like Vegeta decided to have kids with you."
He immediately gets smacked upside the head.
B: "Of course I do! Look at me, I'm huge! This is going to be great!"
She struck a few poses and then shrank back to regular form, "Thank you Roshi! I'm going back home now, see ya later."
13331.title: Max Power Bulma

133312.content: Does she figure out how to grow bigger than her current max form?
133312.title: Something else

1333121.content: After mastering the technique that Roshi taught her, Bulma figured she would experiment a little with it. She tested the effects of the technique and analysed her body during the whole process. She figured out a way to get bigger after a few tests. She just needed a little boost to make it possible. She wanted to make the form second nature to her so that she didn't have to focus for a few seconds to grow. She made a serum that should do the trick after drawing blood from herself when in max form, and some from Vegeta. After mixing and testing, she finally found the balance and went for it. "Ok, this should just about do it. Now to see if this can make me stronger than ever!" She injected it in herself, and grew immediately as though it were out of reflex "Ok, lets so if I can shrink still." and she powered down, and then back up, and then down again. "I think I got it figured out! And I'm a lot bigger than Roshi will ever be! I need to test out my strength." She shrank and ran to the gravity chamber. She powered up and began at 10x normal gravity, "Ok, so far so good. Not feeling much." 30x, "Starting to feel it, but can still keep going." She kept slowly progressing until she ended up at 150x, "Ok, I think that's good enough" she said while under a ton of pressure that brought her to her knees, "I'm as strong as Goku was when he fought Freeza... I'm almost as strong as a super saiyan... no way! I need to go further, but how?
1333121.title: Maximumer!

choices: Bulma challenges Chi-chi to an arm wrestling match.
13331212.content: Deciding that this could wait another day, Bulma now wanted to have some fun with the power she had. This meant beating someone in a contest of strength and muscle. Beating Vegeta and Goku was out of the question{for now} but she was okay with starting small. But where to start?
13331212.title: Test of power

Suddenly, Bulma feels a weirdly tingly in her muscles and breasts. "What's this?" Bulma got her answer right after she asked the question. "Oooooooooooh! I LIKE THIS!" Bulma's clothes start ripping from sleeves to make more room for her growing muscles. Bulma moans in pleasure when her breasts grow and become more sensetive. After a couple of minutes, her muscles have become four times bigger than before while her breasts grew to an enormous Triple T-Cup. "I want more growth!" Bulma screams.
13333211.title: Super Bulma!!!

135.title: Zangya

choices: She grows to the size of a female bodybuilder.
She grows to the size of Super Trunks
1351.content:
Zangya cackled as she threw Krillin to the side. "Did you idiots honestly think you could defeat us?" she laughed, surveying the Z-Fighters. Tien Shinhan and Krillin had been knocked out, and Trunks was busy fending off Kogu and Bido. Behind her, Bojack sat in his throne, watching the fight. The only earthling not currently occupied was Son Gohan, who was glaring at the femme fatale.

"I'll make you pay for hurting my friends!" yelled the half-Saiyan, his hair turning a golden blonde and spiking up slightly.

Zangya smirked evilly. "Children should be nice to their elders," she said, throwing a large energy blast at him. Gohan swatted it aside.

Bojack narrowed his eyes. "Zangya, finish the boy quickly," he growled.

"As you wish, Lord Bojack," she replied, reaching for her necklace. With a *CRUNCH*, she crushed it into dust. "Watch, little boy, as you face your doom!"

A bead of sweat rolled down Gohan's face. As he watched, her hair turned a fiery red, and her skin an emerald green...
1351.title: Zangya Unbound

13511.content: As Zangya finished her transformation, she flexed her mighty biceps and smirked. "My necklace acts as an inhibitor for the full power of my transformation" she told a shocked Gohan "I don't like to go all out unless it's worth it but for you, I'll make an exception." Gohan narrowed his eyes. He had never seen such muscles on a woman before and she felt as strong as she looked. It might take more than he had to beat her.
13511.title: She grows to the size of a female bodybuilder.

1442.content:
It was not easy for Broly to find all seven dragonballs, but he made it and summoned Shenron.

"What is your wish?"

Broly did not hesitate. He wanted to show true power to the Saijans on earth.

"I wish to grow taller and more muscular all the time."

Shenron just nodded and Broly's body began to glow. He could feel it. He was getting bigger and more muscular at the same time. He moaned lustfully. He could feel the sensation in every inch of his body. That's what he wanted.

"Yeah... BIGGER"

It stopped for now... He was 10 meters tall and was even more muscled up than ever before. He knew what to do now and Shenron disappeared.

15111.content:
LOCATION: Planet Namek, in an alternate universe and timeline

         The tyrant stood over the fallen Namekian warrior. "You honestly thought you could defeat me in my final form?" Frieza sneered. "Pathetic."

         "Tch... You still can't use the Dragon Balls! They only respond to our language!"

         "Is that so? It seems you actually have a use." Using his telekinesis, Frieza held the Namekian in the air. "Now summon the dragon, and your death will be quick and painless. Otherwise I might continue to torture your meaningless existence."

          Seeing no other alternative, the Namekian solemnly bowed his head and called out the words. The massive Dragon Balls rose as the mighty Porunga appeared. "YOU HAVE SUMMONED ME. STATE YOUR FIRST WISH. "

Frieza laughed evilly, as he stated...

1543121.content: Vegeta chuckled himself as he registered for the bodybuilding contest that would take place in a few days. "Kakarot will not best me this time" he assured himself confidently "now that I've mastered the Ultra Super Saiyan form, none will surpass my physique!" The saiyan prince was about to gloat further when someone approached. Who was it?
1543121.title: Bodybuilding Budokai!

15431211.content:
"Hey, sign me up when you're done Vegeta!" Bulma called out as she approached her husband. The Saiyan Prince turned to look at the blue haired genius in disbelief, then skepticism. He then burst out laughing.

"You!? Bulma, do you know what kind of contest this is? The women that have entered already will destroy you before the first round begins, never mind the men! Stick to science and leave the weight lifting to the rest of us."

Vegeta walked off then and left Bulma fuming. How dare he doubt her!? She had been secretly working on Roshi's Max Power Transformation, combined with high tech gym equipment of her own design. She would pump up bigger than Chi-chi, Videl, Eighteen, or any other contestant in the women's division, then she'd out-muscle the guys for fun! With these thoughts in mind, the blue haired genius signed herself up and walked off to plan her revenge.
15431211.title: Bulma, looking to sign up too.

1543122.content: What if Gine and Fasha survived and came to Earth instead of Raditz? Also, what if they were Super Saiyans?
1543122.title: Next choice

choices: Chi-chi spars with Roshi to test her strength.
15433.content:
A few months before the twenty-third Budokai, Master Roshi got a visit from Chi-chi, the Ox King's daughter. The old pervert was surprised by how well she had developed but was even more surprised by her request. "You want me to train you for the Budokai!?"

The Ox princess nodded. "It's for Goku" she said a bit shyly "we plan to marry soon and I want to show him we're a good match. I figure giving him a good fight will do it." Roshi nodded though he doubted the naive girl was right about Goku's intentions. The boy probably didn't even know what marriage was. "I'll do my best Chi-chi but you may have bitten off more than you can chew. Goku's far stronger than you realize."

Chi-chi insisted she didn't care and the training began. She progressed well, learning the kamehameha wave in the first week, but when the training was almost over, she came to him with a strange request. "You want to learn what!?"

"I want to learn your Max Power transformation" Chi-chi insisted "my dad always said you were at your strongest with it. Goku's sure to be impressed if I show up with that kind of power." Roshi was aghast. "But Chi-chi, women aren't meant to assume such a form" he protested "you'll become ugly and unfeminine."

Chi-chi placed her hands on her hips and glared. "Goku won't care how i look and I can always power down when I'm not using it. You said you'd teach me all you could and I'm not leaving this island until you do!"

Roshi relented and showed Chi-chi what to do, dreading the result. None of the few female students he'd had over the years had asked to learn and he wasn't even sure if they could. Of course, he usually chased them away after a day or two so they might've been unable to ask.

Chi-chi did as Roshi instructed and began to grow. Within minutes, she looked like a female bodybuilder and her breasts had doubled in size. She flexed a bicep and grinned with triumph. Goku wouldn't know what hit him!

"Still think I'm ugly and unfeminine Roshi?" The old master didn't respond, too busy drooling over Chi-chi's enlarged breasts. A quick whack to the head ended this. "Quit gawking you old pervert, there's work to do!"
15433.title: Chi-Chi's Ascension

155.content: How about one of the several Fusions?
155.title: Fusion Frenzy
